gw.solr.mapper

Class BuildDate

  • gw.solr.mapper.BuildDate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject, ISolrIndexMapper, ISolrQueryMapper<T>

    public class BuildDate
implements ISolrIndexMapper, ISolrQueryMapper<T>, _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DATE_FORMAT
      Parse dates in UTC (GMT) time when receiving Strings from Solr TrieDateField type. Mirrors settings used inside Solr for interpreting and formatting these date strings. See org.apache.solr.schema.DateField.ISO8601CanonicalDateFormat
      static UltraFastDateFormat DATE_FORMATTER
      static ThreadLocal<DateFormat> DATE_PARSER

      • Fields inherited from class _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

      • DATE_FORMAT

        String DATE_FORMAT
        Parse dates in UTC (GMT) time when receiving Strings from Solr TrieDateField type. Mirrors settings used inside Solr for interpreting and formatting these date strings. See org.apache.solr.schema.DateField.ISO8601CanonicalDateFormat

        Date mapIndex(List<DataProperty> inputDataProperties,
            IDataHolder dataHolder)
        Converts an instance of Date type to the format expected by a Solr TrieDateField type.
        Parameters:
        inputDataProperties - array of entity properties
        dataHolder -
        Returns:
        string in the format expected by a Solr TrieDateField type.

      • mapQuery

        Range<Date> mapQuery(List<DataProperty> queryDataProperties,
                   IDataHolder dataHolder)
        Map a date range into the proper format for a Solr range query value
        Parameters:
        queryDataProperties -
        dataHolder -
        Returns:
        T the data or data range for this query field, or null if no query against this field is required. Data should not be quoted or encoded. This will be handled by the caller according to the encoder registered for this query term.
